max_function_size.title: Maximum function size
max_function_size.description: Maximum number of bytes in functions to decompile

report_threshold.title: Lifter report threshold
report_threshold.description: The maximum amount of instructions which could not be lifted to be reported individually.

no_bit_masks.title: Omit subregister masking
no_bit_masks.description: Avoid using bit masks for representing 8-, 16, (32-)bit registers: e.g. on x86 ax = 8 becomes (word) eax = 8 instead of eax = (eax & 0xffff0000) | 8). Results in more understandable but potentially less accurate code.

engine.title: Logic Engine for simplifying conditions
engine.description: Pick between delogic or z3 for simplifying conditions.

timeout_satisfiable.title: Logic engine timeout
timeout_satisfiable.description: Timeout (ms) for the logic engine verifying whether a path is dead.

timeout_satisfiable.title: Logic engine timeout
timeout_satisfiable.description: Timeout (ms) for the logic engine verifying whether a loop is dead.

threshold.title: expression threshold
threshold.description: The amount of occurrences an expression needs to have to be considered for CSE.

intra.title: intra expression
intra.description: Enable CSE on subexpressions of the same parent expression.

string_threshold.title: string threshold
string_threshold.description: The amount of occurrences a string expression must have to be eliminated

min_string_length.title: string length threshold
min_string_length.description: The minimum amount of characters a string expression must have to be considered for elimination.

enabled.title: Array access detection
enabled.description: write array access as base[offset], instead of (*(base+offset))

max_assignment_complexity.title: maximum assignment complexity
max_assignment_complexity.description: Assignments with a complexity above this threshold will be simplified.

max_call_complexity.title: maximum call complexity
max_call_complexity.description: Calls with a complexity above this threshold will be simplified.

max_return_complexity.title: maximum return complexity
max_return_complexity.description: Return statements with a complexity above this threshold will be simplified.

keep_empty_for_loops.title: Keep empty for-loops
keep_empty_for_loops.description: Transform while-loops to for-loops although the resulting for-loop would be empty.

rename_for_loop_variables.title: Rename for-loop variables
rename_for_loop_variables.description: Rename for-loop variables to i, j, k, ...

condition_types_for_loops_simple_loop_co.title: Allowed condition type for simple for-loops conditions
condition_types_for_loops_simple_loop_co.description: Only transforms a given simple while loop to a for loop is the condition type is correct

rename_while_loop_variables.title: Rename while-loop variables
rename_while_loop_variables.description: Rename while-loop counter variables to counter, counter1, ...

mode.title: SSA Options
enumDescriptions: renames a SSA-variable to a non SSA-variable by adding the label to the name
renames the SSA-variables such that the total number of non SSA-variables is minimal and then lifts the phi-functions
first lifts the phi-functions and renames the SSA-variables such that the total number of non SSA-variables is (almost) minimal
first lifts the phi-functions and renames the SSA-variables according to their dependencies.
out-of-SSA due to Sreedhar et. al.
mode.description: Optimization options for variable renaming in out of SSA

max_complexity.title: Maximum Complexity for the Logic Simplifier
max_complexity.description: The maximum amount of elements in a condition to be considered for the logic simplifier.

use_increment_int.title: Enable integer incrementation suffixes
use_increment_int.description: Enables shorthands for integer incrementation (e.g. i++).

use_increment_float.title: Enable float incrementation suffixes
use_increment_float.description: Enables shorthands for float incrementation (e.g. f++)

byte_format.title: Byte constant format
byte_format.description: Defines the representation of a byte-size constant (character, hexadecimal or decimal)

byte_format_hint.title: Byte constant format hints
byte_format_hint.description: Defines the representation of byte-size constant hint (c-style comment). Use none for no comments displayed.

negative_hex_as_twos_complement.title: Negative Hex As Twos Complement
negative_hex_as_twos_complement.description: Converts a decimal -1 into 0xff instead of -0x1

aggressive_array_detection.title: Access array elements via index instead of pointer
aggressive_array_detection.description: aggressive: *(a+i*4) is printed as a[i] even if the type of a is void/unknown

variable_declarations_per_line.title: Variable Declarations Per Line
variable_declarations_per_line.description: How many variables with common type are declared on one line

style_plugin.title: Style plugin
style_plugin.description: Which style plugin to use (does not apply to widget)

style_cmd.title: Linting theme
style_cmd.description: Linting theme (does not apply to widget)

stage_output.title: Show stage output
stage_output.description: Select how stage output should be displayed.

show_starting_point.title: Show starting point
show_starting_point.description: Display initial lifting before any transformations are done.

show_selected.title: Select stages for display
show_selected.description: Comma separated stage names to show output from.

font_italic.title: Font italic
font_italic.description: Set italic font for decompiler output

font_bold.title: Font bold
font_bold.description: Set bold font for decompiler output
